title: Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety         NPS  The safety of our visitors is very important to the management and staff of Arlington House, The Robert E. Lee Memorial. Here are a few safety tips for your visit to our historical site: Watch your step on uneven surfaces To help protect park resources and ensure a safe and enjoyable visit for everyone, please follow park rules and posted regulations Pets are not allowed inside public buildings or in the cemetery, unless a designated assistance animal Please dispose of your garbage in trash containers or take it with you when you leave In case of emergency, contact the U.S. Park Police at (202) 610-7500 or Fort Myer Fire and Rescue (703) 696-3600
